        result.append(c21[i] + c22[i])
    return result

def add_matrices(a, b):
    return [[a[i][j] + b[i][j] for j in range(len(a[i]))] for i in range(len(a))]

def subtract_matrices(a, b):
    return [[a[i][j] - b[i][j] for j in range(len(a[i]))] for i in range(len(a))]
